translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there was a baker from Chicago.
translation.it: C'era una volta una pasticciera di Chicago.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[narrator] That's me, Stacy,
who looks just like Margaret, the duchess of Montenaro.
translation.it: che assomiglio a Margaret, la Duchessa di Montenaro.

translation.en: Stacy, me again, married the handsome Prince Edward at Christmas,
translation.it: A Natale ho sposato il bel Principe Edward… STACY E MARGARET INNAMORATE

translation.en: while Margaret married my adorable best friend Kevin
translation.it: …e Margaret il mio miglior amico Kevin

translation.en: right before she was crowned queen of Montenaro,
translation.it: poco prima di essere incoronata Regina di Montenaro.

translation.en: which almost didn't happen,
translation.it: Ci è riuscita per un soffio,

translation.en: because her cousin Fiona, who looks like both of us
translation.it: perché sua cugina Fiona, che ci somiglia in modo stravagante…

translation.en: and is so over-the-top…
[Stacy] …impersonated her in an attempt to steal the throne.
translation.it: …si è travestita da lei per rubarle il trono.

translation.en: Luckily, Fiona was caught and sentenced to many years of community service.
translation.it: Fortunatamente, Fiona è stata scoperta e condannata ai lavori socialmente utili.

translation.en: I thought she should go to jail, but Margaret says she's family.
translation.it: Speravo finisse in carcere, ma siamo una famiglia, dice Margaret.

translation.en: [chuckles] Could Christmas get any more eventful?
translation.it: Si può avere un Natale più movimentato? NETFLIX PRESENTA

translation.en: -Well, maybe. -[sirens wail]
Because this year, I'm cochairing
an international Christmas festival with Margaret,
translation.it: un festival natalizio internazionale con Margaret,

translation.en: who's just about my best friend in the world.
translation.it: cioè la mia migliore amica in assoluto.

translation.en: And to commemorate the occasion,
the Vatican has loaned us the Star of Peace,
translation.it: il Vaticano ci ha prestato la Stella della Pace,

translation.en: a priceless relic that once belonged to Saint Nicholas himself.
translation.it: una reliquia inestimabile che apparteneva a San Nicola.

translation.en: The Star will be kept under guard until it goes on top of a ginormous tree
translation.it: La Stella sarà tenuta sotto chiave finché non la poseremo in cima a un albero

translation.en: at our tree-lighting ceremony on Christmas Eve.
translation.it: per l'accensione delle luci della vigilia di Natale.

translation.en: Oh, and that's Cardinal Amoah, the special emissary from the Vatican.
translation.it: Ed ecco il cardinale Amoah, l'emissario speciale del Vaticano.

translation.en: Oh, this is so huge!
Can you believe this?
It's incredible.
I feel like we're making history.
translation.it: Mi sembra di fare la storia.

translation.en: Because you are making history.
Your Royal Majesty, Your Highness,
I present to you the Star of Peace.
No one's getting paid a dime. It all goes to charity.
translation.it: Non è retribuito, va tutto in beneficenza.

translation.en: Yes, we had a cancellation,
so there's one final audition to fill the spot in the program.
translation.it: quindi terremo dei provini per riempire quello slot.

translation.en: [Kevin] Okay. Bye.
Stacy and I are handling the details ourselves, so we'll be there.
translation.it: Ci occupiamo io e Stacy dei dettagli, quindi ci saremo.

translation.en: All right, thank you for checking. Bye.
[exhales] That's the last call I'm taking tonight. Me too.
Oh, except for this one. Hey, Liv!
-Merry Christmas! -Merry Christmas.
Mm, we miss you, darling. How were exams?
translation.it: Ci manchi. Come sono andati gli esami?

translation.en: [Olivia] A major pain.
I love the ballet academy, don't get me wrong,
translation.it: Non fraintendetemi, adoro la scuola di danza,

translation.en: but they make you work really hard on the school part.
translation.it: ma la componente scuola è troppo impegnativa.

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing you can't handle.
Are you on your way to the airport?
That's why I called. JFK's closed because of the weather.
translation.it: Chiamavo per questo: JFK è stato chiuso per maltempo.

translation.en: The chaperone says we might leave from Bradley.
translation.it: Ma forse possiamo decollare da Bradley.

translation.en: Oh. Well, keep us posted.
I love you.
I love you more.
I'll sleep better once I know she's here.
translation.it: Dormirò tranquilla, solo quando sarà qui.

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both.
Come here.
[Edward] Very good, Your Majesty.
Margaret and I love working together. Yeah, I'm sure we'll do it again.
translation.it: Io e Margaret adoriamo lavorare insieme. Lo rifaremo di sicuro.

translation.en: It's just right now we kinda have our hands full.
translation.it: Però, al momento, abbiamo molta carne al fuoco.

translation.en: We would love to see the corgis as well.
-Absolutely. You can quote me. -Yes. And a very Merry Christmas to you.
-Thank you so much. Bye. -[Edward] Cheers.
Well, that makes 11 ambassadors, nine prime ministers, seven kings, four queens,
translation.it: Abbiamo 11 ambasciatori, 9 primi ministri, 7 re e 4 regine,

translation.en: an entire delegation from Penglia--
And a partridge in a pear tree?
translation.it: E una pernice in un pero?

translation.en: -[sighs] Something like that. -[Stacy laughs]
I'm so glad I have you to help me with all this crazy last-minute stuff.
translation.it: Per fortuna mi aiuti tu con tutte queste cose last-minute.

translation.en: We make a great team, don't we? Just like your dear old Chicago Red Sox.
translation.it: Siamo una bella squadra, no? Come i tuoi cari Chicago Red Sox.

translation.en: It's White Sox.
Yes, them as well. All the socks.
translation.it: Sì, anche loro. Tutti i Sox.

translation.en: [choir] ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ And a Happy New Year ♪
-Oh, bravo! -Fabulous.
-Thank you very much. -This way please, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.it: - Grazie mille. - Da questa parte, prego.

translation.en: Maybe we put them after the yodeler?
translation.it: Li mettiamo dopo la cantante di jodel?

translation.en: Do we really need a yodeler?
Well, we don't want to offend the Swiss ambassador.
We don't want to offend anyone.
[clicks tongue] Yeah.
I'm terribly sorry to interrupt, Your Majesty, but we have,
translation.it: Mi dispiace interrompervi, Vostra Maestà, ma abbiamo…

translation.en: well, a bit of a situation.
This is Inspector Moretti, superintendent of police.
translation.it: Questa è l'ispettore Moretti della polizia.

translation.en: The police? Well, that sounds serious.
translation.it: Della polizia? Sembra una cosa seria.

translation.en: I'm afraid it is, Your Majesty.
translation.it: Temo che lo sia, Vostra Maestà.

translation.en: [Stacy] The Star of Peace is gone.
translation.it: Hanno rubato la Stella della Pace.

translation.en: [exhales] This can't be happening.
Isn't the museum vault under guard around the clock?
translation.it: Il caveau del museo non è sorvegliato?

translation.en: The guards were drugged. We found traces of chloromethazine in the ventilation system
translation.it: Hanno drogato le guardie, c'erano tracce di cloro-metazina nei condotti

translation.en: that services the security office.
Surely there's surveillance footage. The thieves wiped the hard drives clean.
translation.it: - Ci saranno dei filmati. - I ladri hanno cancellato gli hard disk.

translation.en: Whoever did this came prepared.
We've notified Interpol, but with no forensic evidence, we've very little to go on.
translation.it: Abbiamo avvisato l'Interpol, ma senza prove si può fare ben poco.

translation.en: Just please promise us you'll get it back in time for the ceremony.
translation.it: Mi prometta che la ritroverete in tempo per la cerimonia.

translation.en: I'm afraid that would be a piecrust promise.
Easily made, easily broken.
translation.it: facile da fare, ma non da mantenere.

translation.en: Oh dear!
We'd like to keep the investigation confidential until we know more.
translation.it: Vorremmo mantenere l'indagine riservata finché non ne sapremo di più.

translation.en: Well, shall we notify the cardinal?
Since it's possible the breach came from within Vatican security,
translation.it: Dato che potrebbe essere un lavoro interno al Vaticano,

translation.en: Interpol has asked us to hold off until we rule them out.
translation.it: l'Interpol ha deciso di non informarli.

translation.en: Just know we're doing everything we can.
Well, thank you, Inspector.
[sighs] The relic of Saint Nicholas.
I mean, this is an international scandal of epic proportions.
translation.it: È uno scandalo internazionale di proporzioni epiche.

translation.en: [Kevin] Let's just try to stay calm, okay?
Yes, of course. [clears throat] Keep calm.
-I sympathize with you completely. -[sighs] Thank you.
But when the crown jewels of Belgravia were stolen,
translation.it: Quando rubarono la corona di Belgravia,

translation.en: oh, my grandfather, the king, was nearly deposed.
translation.it: mio nonno, il re, venne quasi deposto.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Not helping.
But the jewels were eventually recovered.
-Well, bits and pieces. -Ah.
A ruby here, a sapphire there, a diamond, you know.
translation.it: Un rubino qua, un zaffiro là, un diamante…

translation.en: Dude. Come on.
There must be something we can do.
-[exhales] -The police are handling it.
They have no clues and no leads.
translation.it: Non hanno né indizi né piste.

translation.en: Wait. If the police don't have any leads,
translation.it: Aspetta. Se la polizia non ha alcuna pista,

translation.en: then it's up to us to come up with something they haven't thought of.
translation.it: allora sta a noi trovarne una a cui non hanno pensato.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, what we need is someone with information that the police don't have.
translation.it: Ci serve qualcuno che abbia delle informazioni che la polizia non ha.

translation.en: Someone with connections to the black market,
translation.it: Qualcuno con conoscenze nel mercato nero

translation.en: and it wouldn't hurt if they were just a little bit crooked.
translation.it: e che, magari, operi un po' fuori dalla legge.

translation.en: A little crooked?
Yes, indeed.
We need a person who actually thinks like a criminal,
translation.it: Ci serve qualcuno che pensi come un criminale,

translation.en: who has a history of never considering consequences,
translation.it: che non badi mai alle conseguenze delle sue azioni

translation.en: and has absolutely no fear of breaking the rules.
translation.it: e che non abbia paura di infrangere le regole.

translation.en: -If only we knew someone like that. -[both] Fiona.
If anyone knows the unseemly side of things, it's my cousin.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che ha una reputazione controversa, è mia cugina.

translation.en: [scoffs] I should know.
I'm sorry. Let me get this straight.
You want to employ the woman who, with the help of her cohorts,
translation.it: Volete assumere la donna che, con i suoi aiutanti,

translation.en: masqueraded as you in an attempt to take over the country?
translation.it: si è finta te per governare la nazione?

translation.en: Didn't she go to jail?
Fiona's serving a sentence of community service
translation.it: Sta facendo dei lavori socialmente utili

translation.en: at St. Michael's Convent.
I was actually thinking of inviting her for Christmas before any of this happened.
translation.it: Avevo già intenzione di invitarla per Natale prima di tutto questo.

translation.en: You were?
I've always felt sorry for her,
translation.it: Mi è sempre dispiaciuto per lei,

translation.en: growing up in boarding schools with no one to look after her.
translation.it: è cresciuta in collegio senza nessuno che si occupasse di lei.

translation.en: I think this past year at the convent's done her some good.
translation.it: L'anno passato al convento le avrà fatto bene.

translation.en: Not that much good.
Look, it's not like I trust Fiona,
but I mean, St. Michael's is less than an hour away, and the police are stumped.
translation.it: ma insomma, il convento dista un'ora e la polizia è in un vicolo cieco.

translation.en: It would be unconscionable to sit here and do nothing.
translation.it: Non avrebbe senso restarsene qui a girarci i pollici.

translation.en: What have we got to lose?
You know, anything and everything that isn't nailed down, but… [sighs]
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa non sia inchiodata al pavimento, ma…

translation.en: …I can't think of any other ideas, so…
[sighs] I'll start nailing things down.
[nun] You missed a spot.
Where?
[nun] The library.
You know, the place with the books.
[scoffs] It's time for my break.
[nun] Need I remind you, Fiona Pembroke,
that you still owe 1,242 hours -of community service? -[watch beeps]
translation.it: che ti mancano ancora 1,242 ore di lavori socialmente utili?

translation.en: [nun] Be that as it may, Mother Superior wants to see you in her office.
translation.it: Comunque, la Madre Superiora ti attende nel suo ufficio.

translation.en: Now!
Savage.
The sisters and I are absolutely thrilled
translation.it: Io e le sorelle siamo entusiaste

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke will be spending Christmas with you.
translation.it: che la signorina Pembroke passi il Natale con voi.

translation.en: She's the only family I have left.
translation.it: È l'unica parente che mi è rimasta.

translation.en: Well, and her mother, but I haven't seen my aunt in years.
translation.it: Beh, lei e sua madre, ma non vedo mia zia da anni.

translation.en: I do hope Fiona hasn't been too much trouble.
translation.it: Spero che Fiona non vi stia dando troppi problemi.

translation.en: We are all God's children, my dear. [chuckles]
translation.it: Siamo tutti figli di Dio, mia cara.

translation.en: What a scrumptious surprise.
Oh, you're looking well.
What brings you to my private little corner of purgatory?
translation.it: Cosa ti porta nel mio purgatorio personale?

translation.en: I thought it might be pleasant for us to have the holidays together.
translation.it: Pensavo che ti potesse fare piacere passare le vacanze insieme.

translation.en: Oh. Will I be mopping or dusting?
translation.it: Dovrò dare lo straccio o spolverare?

translation.en: [chuckles] You'll be our guest.
[Mother Superior] After, uh, prayerful consideration,
I've told Her Majesty I could allow a discrete bending of the rules,
translation.it: ho detto a Sua Maestà che era possibile raggirare discretamente le regole,

translation.en: seeing as it's Christmas.
As long as you promise to return by December 26th.
translation.it: A patto che tu prometta di tornare entro il 26 dicembre.

translation.en: There's a hearing of the disciplinary committee
for which you must be present.
We absolutely promise to have her back in time, Mother Superior.
translation.it: Tornerà in tempo, glielo prometto, Madre Superiora.

translation.en: You have my word.
[inhales] Well, in that case,
Ms. Pembroke is free to spend the holidays at the palace.
translation.it: la signorina Pembroke è libera di passare le vacanze a palazzo.

translation.en: Sounds like a gas.
Thank you, Inspector.
Yeah, keep us posted.
Anything?
They thought they had a lead, but it didn't pan out.
translation.it: Pensavano di avere una pista, ma nulla di fatto.

translation.en: [exhales] We could certainly use some good news right about now.
No worries, royal six-pack. Good news has arrived.
translation.it: Tranquillo, fustacchione reale, ecco la vostra buona notizia.

translation.en: Special delivery.
-Handle with care. -[Fiona] Hm.
[Stacy] Um, Reggie and Mindy? You gotta be kidding me.
translation.it: Reggie e Mindy? Stai scherzando, vero?

translation.en: Fiona agreed to help us, but she said she needed her squad.
translation.it: Fiona ha accettato di aiutarci, ma le serviva la sua squadra.

translation.en: -Weren't they in jail as well? -[scoffs]
translation.it: Non erano in prigione anche loro?

translation.en: They were, but I, uh, pulled a few strings. [chuckles]
translation.it: Sì, ma ho chiesto qualche favore qua e là.

translation.en: Well, it's good to be queen.
How's my fave cuzzie-in-law?
translation.it: Come sta il mio cuginetto acquisito preferito?

translation.en: Fine, I guess.
I hope you ain't still sore over our little mix-up last Christmas.
translation.it: Spero tu non ce l'abbia più con noi per quel malinteso del Natale scorso.

translation.en: -Mix-up? -[Reggie] Yeah.
You kidnapped me! Okay. Still sore.
translation.it: - Mi avete rapita! - Ce l'ha ancora con noi.

translation.en: Spicy.
Why don't I have Mrs. Donatelli show you your rooms?
translation.it: La signorina Donatelli vi accompagnerà nelle vostre stanze.

translation.en: This way. Please.
Meow.
Right, yes, uh,
meow to you as well.
-No respect. -[mouths] No.
translation.it: - Hai perso il mio rispetto. - No.

translation.en: None. Cool.
Am I late for brekkie?
Only by an hour… or three.
No worries. I couldn't eat a thing.
Hey!
But I do have news. I've been in touch with an associate
translation.it: Ma ho delle novità. Ho contattato un mio collaboratore

translation.en: who should be able to help us find our missing treasure.
translation.it: che potrebbe aiutarci a trovare il tesoro perduto.

translation.en: [Margaret] Does this associate have a name?
I'd rather not say until he's on board, but trust me, he's the GOAT.
translation.it: Preferirei non dirlo finché non accetterà, ma fidatevi, è il top.

translation.en: Sorry, he's… he's a goat?
translation.it: Scusa, è un top… una maglietta?

translation.en: "Greatest of all time," babe. It's like a sports thing.
translation.it: È il top, è il migliore.

translation.en: I knew that. I… I knew that.
[Mindy] I bet it's that count from Barcelona.
translation.it: Scommetto che è quel conte di Barcellona.

translation.en: [Reggie] Nah, he's a squirrelly one.
translation.it: No, quello è un tipo schivo.

translation.en: Never looks you square in the eye.
translation.it: Non ti guarda mai negli occhi.

translation.en: He's got a glass eye, idiot.
translation.it: Ha un occhio di vetro, idiota.

translation.en: [inhales] I'll need to borrow a car,
and preferably a 'rari that matches my Manolos.
translation.it: che finisca per "rari" e si abbini alle mie Manolo.

translation.en: Don't worry. Frank will be happy to drive you.
Don't you trust me, royal boo?
[Stacy] Hell no.
And Bonnie and Clyde are staying right here
translation.it: E Bonnie e Clyde resteranno qui,

translation.en: just to make sure you come back.
-[scoffs] -Here? What are we supposed to do all day?
translation.it: Qui? E cosa faremo tutto il giorno?

translation.en: Perhaps you could start by, uh, returning the silver.
Reggie!
What?
[sighs] Dear.
Right. Okay. Now look, I don't wish to be impertinent, Your Ladyship,
translation.it: Ok, non vorrei sembrarvi impertinente, Vostra Signoria,

translation.en: but if you're not out in 20 minutes,
translation.it: ma, se non uscite tra 20 minuti,

translation.en: I have strict orders to come in there and fetch.
translation.it: mi è stato ordinato di venire a recuperarvi.

translation.en: Bossy.
Remember! Twenty minutes!
You haven't lost your touch.
translation.it: Non ci hai perso la mano.

translation.en: Some say.
You're looking well, Peter.
You too, Pemmie.
It's Pembroke.
You'll always be Pemmie to me.
So, how long has it been
since you walked out on me that spring night in Barbados?
translation.it: da quando mi hai lasciato quella sera alle Barbados?

translation.en: Oh, please.
We were always better as friends. Everything else was a complication.
translation.it: Siamo sempre stati meglio come amici, il resto era troppo complicato.

translation.en: That's an interesting word for it.
I heard from Bianca the other day.
Mummy's always had a soft spot for you since we were in nappies.
translation.it: Mia mamma ha un debole per te fin da quando eravamo piccoli.

translation.en: She says you won't return her calls.
I have nothing to say.
[Peter] Oh, come on, Pemmie. It's Christmas.
Give the old girl a break.
If I remember, you weren't speaking to your father.
translation.it: Se non erro, non eri in buoni rapporti con tuo padre.

translation.en: No. I wasn't.
But I saw him last Christmas, two days before he passed.
translation.it: Ma l'ho visto lo scorso Natale, due giorni prima che morisse.

translation.en: And I'm very glad I did.
Well, now that we've limped down memory lane, can we talk business?
translation.it: Ora che abbiamo fatto un tuffo maldestro nel passato, parliamo d'affari?

translation.en: The Star of Peace.
You want my help getting it back.
translation.it: Ti serve il mio aiuto per ritrovarla.

translation.en: Question is, why is it so important to you?
translation.it: Ma la domanda è: perché è così importante per te?

translation.en: [Fiona] Well, it's important to my cuzzie.
translation.it: Lo è per la mia cuginetta.

translation.en: I treated her… [sighs] …unkindly,
so I thought I'd make it up to her.
translation.it: così ho pensato di farmi perdonare.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I heard about your little escapade.
translation.it: Sì, ho sentito dei tuoi misfatti.

translation.en: So, will you help despite our colorful past?
translation.it: Allora, mi aiuterai nonostante il nostro passato burrascoso?

translation.en: You know the answer to that.
No matter what, no matter where?
translation.it: Qualunque cosa succeda e ovunque saremo?

translation.en: Let me show you what I've dug up. [chuckles softly]
-Are you coming? -Mm.
Et voilà! The Interpol case file.
translation.it: Il fascicolo dell'Interpol. FURTO STELLA DELLA PACE

translation.en: Interpol? I thought you left them.
translation.it: Interpol? Pensavo non ci lavorassi più.

translation.en: That doesn't mean I've forgotten how to get around their firewalls.
translation.it: Sì, ma so ancora raggirare i loro firewall.

translation.en: -Oh. -According to this report, there are no suspects in the theft,
translation.it: Pare che non sospettino di nessuno,

translation.en: but the interesting bit
is that chloromethazine was used to drug the guards.
translation.it: è che le guardie sono state drogate con della cloro-metazina.

translation.en: Why on earth is that interesting?
Interpol is utterly convinced
that the black-market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.
translation.it: che sia un solo fornitore asiatico a venderla sul mercato nero.

translation.en: And it is,
except for one disreputable pharmacist in Geneva,
translation.it: Tranne che per un farmacista poco raccomandabile di Ginevra,

translation.en: who runs an after-hours operation
out of the back of his warehouse on Place du Port.
translation.it: dal retro del suo magazzino a Place du Port.

translation.en: [inhales] Now, lucky for us,
there are security cameras all along the riverbank.
translation.it: il lungofiume è pieno di telecamere.

translation.en: I searched through the last three days of footage and came up with this.
translation.it: Nei filmati degli ultimi tre giorni ho trovato questo.

translation.en: That's Itai Krauss.
Do I know him?
Indirectly.
He works for an old friend of yours.
translation.it: Lavora per un tuo vecchio amico.

translation.en: -[computer beeps] -Hunter Cunard,
the billionaire hotel tycoon.
Why would a hotel tycoon steal the Star of Peace?
translation.it: Perché un magnate alberghiero ruberebbe la Stella della Pace?

translation.en: It's a little-known fact that Hunter's secret obsession
translation.it: Pochi lo sanno, ma Hunter ha un'ossessione

translation.en: is collecting precious items that aren't for sale.
translation.it: per gli oggetti preziosi che non sono in vendita.

translation.en: Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.
translation.it: Dipinti, antichità, gioielli. Adora le sfide impossibili.

translation.en: You've been an invaluable help, Mr. Maxwell.
translation.it: È stato di grande aiuto, signor Maxwell.

translation.en: I'm certain the police will be grateful for the information.
translation.it: La polizia la ringrazierà per l'informazione.

translation.en: Maggie, don't be silly. You can't go to the police.
translation.it: Maggie, non essere sciocca. Non puoi andare alla polizia.

translation.en: Why not?
Hunter has friends everywhere.
One wrong word to the wrong person, and the Star disappears forever.
translation.it: Se parliamo con la persona sbagliata, addio Stella.

translation.en: [scoffs] So, what do we do?
The only thing you can do.
You steal it back.
How?
Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.
translation.it: Ogni Natale, Hunter organizza una serata esclusiva nella sua tenuta.

translation.en: It happens to be this Saturday night.
[sighs] Well, I assume security will be tight as a drum.
translation.it: Immagino che la sicurezza sarà alle stelle.

translation.en: -Oh. -[Peter] It will be, but there'll also be people coming and going,
translation.it: Sì, ma ci sarà un gran viavai di gente,

translation.en: caterers, florists, guests, which affords us the perfect opportunity.
translation.it: camerieri, fiorai, ospiti, il che giocherà a nostro favore.

translation.en: All we have to do is make sure Hunter is occupied,
and lucky for us, he used to be quite enamored of Fiona.
translation.it: e, fortunatamente, era innamorato perso di Fiona.

translation.en: Oh! So, uh, this bad boy had a thing for you, huh?
translation.it: Questo ragazzaccio aveva un debole per te?

translation.en: Oh, we had a bit of a steamy. [chuckles] But he wasn't my type.
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto un rapporto molto intenso, ma non era il mio tipo.

translation.en: So, when was the last time you spoke to this Mr. Cunard?
translation.it: Quando hai sentito per l'ultima volta questo signor Cunard?

translation.en: [scoffs] A few years ago. We both moved on.
If it's been years, how are you gonna get invited to the party?
translation.it: Se sono passati anni, come farai a farti invitare?

translation.en: Hunter walks his dog through the park behind the library
translation.it: Porta a spasso il cane nel parco dalla biblioteca

translation.en: every morning at 8:00 a.m., rain or shine.
translation.it: ogni mattina alle 8:00, con la pioggia o con il sole.

translation.en: Fiona will do the same.
I'm certain once they coincidentally run into each other,
translation.it: Sono certo che, quando si incontreranno casualmente,

translation.en: she can charm an invitation out of him.
Where is she gonna get a dog?
translation.it: E dove lo trova, un cane?

translation.en: Hm, I can pinch her a pooch.
Forgive me, but aren't you the Peter Maxwell who worked for Interpol
translation.it: Scusi, ma lei non è il Peter Maxwell che lavorava nell'Interpol

translation.en: and was, well, charged with a rather large-scale diamond theft?
translation.it: ed è stato accusato di un cospicuo furto di diamanti?

translation.en: The charges were dismissed, but the incident tarnished my reputation,
translation.it: Le accuse sono state ritirate, ma la mia reputazione ne ha sofferto,

translation.en: so I resigned and started my own private security firm, which has proven quite lucrative.
translation.it: quindi mi sono licenziato e ho fondato una remunerativa agenzia di sicurezza.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. So what's your finder's fee?
-There is no fee. -Why not?
Let's just say… I have my reasons.
translation.it: Diciamo… che ho le mie ragioni.

translation.en: [exhales] This isn't a dog. It's bloody Big Foot.
translation.it: Questo non è un cane. È Bigfoot.

translation.en: Pugsley's a pussycat. You just don't know how to handle him.
translation.it: Pugsley è un agnellino. Sei tu che non sai gestirlo.

translation.en: [Fiona scoffs] I know how I'm going to handle you if I break a heel.
translation.it: So come gestirò te, se mi si rompe un tacco.

translation.en: If I can have your attention… [on comm] …Hunter's just arrived.
translation.it: Vi faccio notare che è appena arrivato Hunter.

translation.en: -[Fiona] Location? -[Peter] He's headed your way.
Oh, he's lush.
[Peter] You'll intersect his path in 100 yards.
Would you please get your nose out of that bush?
[Mindy] He just passed the latte stand.
translation.it: È oltre lo stand di caffè.

translation.en: Ugh, what seems to be your problem?
I don't have a problem.
Not you.
-No. No. -Pugsley!
Stop this at once! Naughty dog. Bad dog. Stop!
Dog! [gasps] Oh no.
Wretched.
My nail!
-[chuckles] -[Fiona] I've broken a nail!
-Where'd you get it from, a horse ranch? -Would you watch what you're saying?
translation.it: - L'hai preso in un ranch di cavalli? - Porta rispetto.

translation.en: You couldn't have got us a toy poodle?
Oh, because poodles grow on trees.
Did she say poodles grew on trees, genius?
translation.it: Ha per caso detto che crescono sugli alberi?

translation.en: Oh, look, it's a poodle tree. [gasps] Let's pick us a white one, shall we?
translation.it: Guarda, un albero di barboncini. Cogliamone uno bianco.

translation.en: -Can we talk about plan B? -Thank God there's a plan B.
translation.it: - Pensiamo al piano B? - Per fortuna ce n'è uno.

translation.en: Peter always has a plan B.
[Peter] Hunter's newest boutique hotel is unveiling its Christmas decorations tonight.
translation.it: Oggi il nuovo boutique hotel di Hunter svelerà le sue decorazioni natalizie.

translation.en: He's planning a walk-through at four.
It might be a bit difficult to get his attention,
translation.it: Non sarà facile attirare la sua attenzione,

translation.en: but I'm sure you'll be up to the challenge…
-[scoffs] -….once you freshen up a bit.
Excuse you.
Messy becomes you, Pemmie, but it's a bit overdone.
translation.it: Il look disordinato ti dona, ma è un po' troppo.

translation.en: Here.
I hate to interrupt,
but if we're gonna get there by four, we better get on with it.
translation.it: ma per arrivare lì alle 16:00, dobbiamo muoverci.

translation.en: Yeah, just give me 20 minutes to moisturize.
You two aren't going anywhere.
-What? -What?
Do not ask me to explain why after what just happened.
translation.it: Non fatemi spiegare il perché, dopo ciò che è successo.

translation.en: -But I didn't do anything wrong! -Zzzt.
translation.it: Ma non ho fatto niente di male!

translation.en: [Mindy] Now she's mad at me!
translation.it: - Ora ce l'ha con me! - Non è colpa mia.

translation.en: -[Reggie] That's not my fault. -[Mindy] Of course it is.
translation.it: - Ora ce l'ha con me! - Non è colpa mia. - Certo che sì. - No, non lo è.

translation.en: -[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
-[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
-[woman 1] Hi! -[woman 2] Hi! It's you!
-Thank you for coming. -[woman 2] Thank you.
-[Peter on comm] Get ready. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[woman 1] Come.
[Hunter] I guess it looks fine.
Just remember, finish by five, or you're fired.
translation.it: Ma se non finisci per le 17:00, sei licenziata.

translation.en: [woman 3] Yes, Mr. Cunard.
He's on his way.
[on comm] Be ready.
Absolutely.
Let's make some merry, shall we?
-Welcome to Santa's workshop. -[Fiona] Thank you.
-[Santa] I hope you've been a good girl. -[Fiona chuckles] Never.
translation.it: - Hai fatto la brava quest'anno? - Mai.

translation.en: Say mistletoe.
[both] Mistletoe!
[Fiona] Have you been naughty or nice?
translation.it: Tu hai fatto il bravo o no?

translation.en: Hunter. [chuckles]
What on earth are you doing here?
I could ask you the same thing.
Well, age before beauty.
I own the place.
-You're joking. -Not at all.
Now it's your turn.
Well, the lounge here serves a candy cane martini that's to die for.
translation.it: Al bar fanno un Martini ai bastoncini di zucchero eccezionale.

translation.en: Then what are we waiting for?
[Hunter] What about you? You been busy spending your inheritance?
translation.it: E tu? Sei stata impegnata a scialacquarti l'eredità?

translation.en: More or less. It's all such a bore.
translation.it: Più o meno. Mi annoio un sacco.

translation.en: What ever happened to that dreary little rodent that you were seeing when we met?
translation.it: Cosa ne è stato di quel roditore con cui uscivi?

translation.en: Peter something.
-Peter Maxwell. -[Fiona scoffs]
That wretched little man.
Oh, you were quite stuck on him as I recall.
translation.it: Eri alquanto presa da lui, se non erro.

translation.en: I don't get stuck on anyone.
translation.it: Non sono mai presa da nessuno.

translation.en: Oh, I'm well aware of that.
If I was a sentimental sort, I'd say you broke my heart.
translation.it: Se fossi un tipo romantico, direi che mi hai spezzato il cuore.

translation.en: Mm. We're quite the pair, aren't we?
-Cut from the same cloth. -[Fiona] Mm.
Which means we both know that you didn't just wander in here for the martinis.
translation.it: Quindi sappiamo entrambi che non sei qui solo per il Martini.

translation.en: So why don't you tell me the real reason for this coincidental meeting?
translation.it: Perché non mi dici il vero motivo di questo incontro fortuito?

translation.en: All right.
It's true I inherited Daddy's fortune.
translation.it: Sì, ho ereditato il patrimonio di papà.

translation.en: It's also true that there's very little of it left.
translation.it: E sì, non me n'è rimasto molto.

translation.en: So you're here for a handout.
Oh, no. Not a handout. A proposition.
translation.it: No, non voglio l'elemosina. Ho una proposta.

translation.en: What kind of proposition?
Well, the Pembroke estate, it would make a darling boutique hotel.
translation.it: Beh, la tenuta Pembroke sarebbe un delizioso boutique hotel.

translation.en: You're not serious about selling.
Dead serious.
But Pembroke's been in your family for generations.
translation.it: Ma Pembroke è della tua famiglia da generazioni.

translation.en: If you're not interested… [scoffs]
Sit… down.
I didn't say I wasn't interested.
Let's talk about this after the New Year, shall we? I'm insanely busy until then.
translation.it: Parliamone nell'anno nuovo, ok? Sono troppo occupata prima.

translation.en: [Hunter] All right.
After New Year's.
-[tango music intensifies] -Ciao.
[Hunter] Fiona!
I'm hosting a little holiday party at my home in the country on Saturday.
translation.it: Sabato terrò una festicciola nella mia tenuta in campagna.

translation.en: Cocktails at six, dinner at eight, if your busy schedule will allow.
translation.it: Aperitivo alle 18:00, cena alle 20:00, se i tuoi impegni lo permettono.

translation.en: Will there be candy cane martinis?
translation.it: Servirai il Martini ai bastoncini di zucchero?

translation.en: Anything your heart desires.
Mm. Delicious. See you Saturday.
Oh, and, uh, you owe me a tango.
[Frank] Good evening, Ms. Pembroke.
Well?
You took a risk, and it paid off.
translation.it: Hai rischiato ed è andata bene.

translation.en: Is that all you have to say?
If Hunter wasn't utterly besotted with you,
translation.it: Se Hunter non fosse stato cotto di te,

translation.en: he'd have called your bluff, and we'd be up a creek right now.
translation.it: avrebbe fiutato il tuo bluff e saremmo nei guai.

translation.en: You're jealous.
[scoffs] I'm not jealous.
Oh, you're completely jealous.
-Do you want me to be jealous? -[Fiona scoffs]
Don't be ridiculous.
Because being jealous would mean there's something between us.
translation.it: Se fossi geloso, ci sarebbe qualcosa tra di noi.

translation.en: -And there is nothing between us. -Absolutely nothing.
translation.it: - E non c'è niente tra di noi. - Assolutamente niente.

translation.en: -Positively nothing. -Completely nothing.
♪ Like this I'm gonna show you ♪
[sighs] It's Mummy again.
Just say hello.
That's all she wants.
[Fiona] But you said we would be together for Christmas.
[Bianca] I know I did, darling, but something's come up.
translation.it: Lo so, tesoro, ma c'è stato un imprevisto.

translation.en: You're gonna have so much fun here at Manderston.
translation.it: Ti divertirai un mondo qui a Manderston.

translation.en: Look, Peter's staying as well. [chuckles]
There. That's settled, then.
Don't go!
[Bianca] Oh, Fiona, darling. Fiona, chin up.
Mummy's got a plane to catch.
-I made this for you. -[Bianca] Oh.
Oh. Charming.
Ciao, bella. Kiss, kiss.
This is a 3D blueprint of Hunter Cunard's Montenaro estate.
translation.it: Ecco la planimetria 3D della tenuta di Hunter Cunard a Montanero.

translation.en: Hunter's private office, here, is located on a separate wing.
translation.it: L'ufficio privato di Hunter si trova in un'ala separata.

translation.en: The adjoining gallery, here, is where he keeps his art collection.
translation.it: Tiene la sua collezione d'arte nella galleria adiacente.

translation.en: The entry is operated by a keypad with a six-digit security code.
translation.it: Si entra con un codice a sei cifre da inserire su una tastiera.

translation.en: And once you're inside the gallery?
The display case is surrounded by a web of laser motion detectors.
translation.it: Questa teca è circondata da sensori di movimento al laser.

translation.en: -We'll need to disarm them. -Dibs on the lasers!
I'm double-jointed. [chuckles]
It'll take a team of three to pull it off.
And then what?
This is an overlay of the internal camera system.
translation.it: Ecco le telecamere del circuito interno.

translation.en: One of us taps into the circuitry, overrides the camera system
translation.it: Uno di noi deve hackerarlo per prenderne il controllo

translation.en: while the other two break into the gallery and steal the Star of Peace.
translation.it: mentre gli altri due rubano la Stella della Pace dalla galleria.

translation.en: This is going to be like breaking into Fort Knox.
translation.it: Sarà come entrare a Fort Knox.

translation.en: [Peter] We have little time to practice.
Everything must be perfect, or we run the risk of getting caught.
translation.it: Dev'essere tutto perfetto o ci beccheranno.

translation.en: And what happens if you do get caught?
Well, Hunter can't call the police
translation.it: Beh, Hunter non può chiamare la polizia

translation.en: to report the theft of something he's stolen.
translation.it: per denunciare il furto di un oggetto rubato.

translation.en: In situations like this,
he has a history of making the problem disappear.
Forever.
We've forgotten the biggest problem of all.
Which is?
I have nothing to wear.
You know, you never told us what our cut is for this little caper.
translation.it: Non ci hai detto a quanto ammonta la nostra quota per questa bravata.

translation.en: Well, the cut, Reggie, is to spend Christmas with Maggie at the palace.
translation.it: La quota, Reggie, è passare il Natale con Maggie a palazzo.

translation.en: Truth is, we really do owe her a favor.
translation.it: Il punto è che le dobbiamo un favore.

translation.en: Maybe, but that doesn't explain Peter Maxwell.
translation.it: Può anche darsi, ma questo non spiega Peter Maxwell.

translation.en: -[Reggie] Hmm! -Unlike the two of you,
Peter is an expert at getting past security systems without getting caught.
translation.it: Peter è un esperto nel superare i sistemi di sicurezza senza farsi beccare.

translation.en: Oh, I bet he can get past your security systems, eh?
translation.it: Scommetto che riesce a superare anche il tuo.

translation.en: Excuse you.
Oh, admit it, Fif. You're a smitten kitten.
translation.it: Ammettilo, Fif. Sei una fata innamorata.

translation.en: There was a time, but it was long ago.
translation.it: Una volta lo ero, ma era tanto tempo fa.

translation.en: Nah. Reggie's onto something.
There's a little bit of flirty dirty going on.
A bit of do you, don't ya. Can't ya, won't ya.
translation.it: Te la spassi un po', se puoi, se vuoi.

translation.en: -Get out. -Oh, come on, Fif!
You gotta give us more than that!
Get out now.
[laughs] All right. Don't get your knickers in a twist.
You miss your mum, don't you?
[hesitates] I don't think she loves me anymore.
translation.it: Secondo me non mi vuole più bene.

translation.en: Of course she does.
Then why would she leave me all alone at Christmas?
translation.it: Allora perché mi ha lasciata sola a Natale?

translation.en: I'm here, and we'll always be friends.
translation.it: Ci sono io. E saremo sempre amici.

translation.en: Come here.
See that up there?
No matter where you are,
all you have to do is look up at the North Star,
translation.it: ti basterà guardare la Stella Polare

translation.en: and you'll never be alone,
'cause wherever I am, you know I'll be looking up at it too.
translation.it: perché saprai che, ovunque io mi trovi, la starò guardando anch'io.

translation.en: -Promise? -Swear.
No matter what?
No matter where.
-[Reggie] Can you just carry some-- -[Frank] I know, I've got funny knees.
translation.it: - Puoi portare… - Sì, ho le ginocchia traballanti.

translation.en: I'm just saying.
If you just--
[all] Ready.
This is an approximation of the motion sensor array in Hunter's gallery.
translation.it: Questa è una replica approssimativa dei sensori di movimento della galleria.

translation.en: And here we go.
This is where it gets tricky.
Oh, I get it. You need a partner to boost you over that high beam.
translation.it: PANNELLO DI CONTROLLO Capito. Qualcuno deve spingerti sopra quel laser.

translation.en: [Peter] Precisely.
It's the only way of getting through to the control panel on the other side.
translation.it: Solo così si arriva al pannello dall'altro lato.

translation.en: Well, limber… [groans] …is my middle name.
Yeah.
Dear God.
Let's reset.
Let me have one more go, okay?
Watch and learn.
Done.
You're up, Reggie.
All right.
"Meet me outside?"
[Fiona] Bon soir, Peter.
Shall we?
Wait for it.
-A client lent it to me for the evening. -How very James Bond.
translation.it: - Me l'ha prestato un cliente. - Fa molto James Bond.

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on, Pemmie. It'll be like old times.
translation.it: Dai, Pemmie, come ai vecchi tempi.

translation.en: [Kevin] What's going on?
Oh, Fiona and Peter. They're really quite adorable together.
translation.it: Fiona e Peter. Sono davvero adorabili insieme.

translation.en: [Kevin] They better be heading up north.
translation.it: Sarà meglio che vadano a nord.

translation.en: [Margaret] Why's that?
Storm's moving in from the south. They closed the airport over an hour ago.
translation.it: Sta arrivando una tempesta da sud e hanno chiuso l'aeroporto un'ora fa.

translation.en: She just texted. They've been rerouted to Brussels.
translation.it: Ha scritto: l'hanno dirottata su Bruxelles.

translation.en: I thought I'd surprise her and pick her up myself.
translation.it: Volevo farle una sorpresa e andare a prenderla.

translation.en: -When do you think you'll be back? -It's an eight-hour drive.
translation.it: - Quando torni? - Sono otto ore di macchina.

translation.en: If I leave first thing in the morning, I should be there by the time she lands.
translation.it: Se parto domattina presto, dovrei arrivare per quando atterra.

translation.en: So I'll only be gone a day, day and a half tops.
translation.it: Starò via al massimo un giorno e mezzo.

translation.en: It should be fine.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
I mean with everything going on.
I'll be in meetings all morning,
and then there's tea with Cardinal Amoah, so you won't miss much.
translation.it: e poi prenderò il tè col cardinale Amoah, non ti perderai granché.

translation.en: -I'll miss you. -[chuckles] I miss you already.
Where are we going? The North Pole?
Almost. Hang on.
Go ahead. Take your best shot.
Looks like Santa's elves smoked a little too much mistletoe.
translation.it: A quanto pare, gli elfi di Babbo Natale si sono fumati troppo vischio.

translation.en: [Peter] Oh, I've got an idea.
Please tell me it involves alcohol.
translation.it: Dimmi che è qualcosa di alcolico.

translation.en: Guess again.
Painting something naughty on those snowmen.
translation.it: Rendere sconci quei pupazzi di neve.

translation.en: Ice-skating.
You're joking.
You know you want to.
In your dreams.
Oh, come on. It'll be fun.
For you.
How do you feel about polar bears?
translation.it: Cosa ne pensi degli orsi polari?

translation.en: No one can ever know about this.
translation.it: Nessuno dovrà mai venire a saperlo.

translation.en: It'll be our little secret.
So, you're really spending Christmas with your cousin?
translation.it: Quindi passerai davvero il Natale con tua cugina?

translation.en: Well, better with Maggie than with Our Lady of Perpetual Pain.
translation.it: Meglio con Maggie che con Nostra Signora del Dolore Perpetuo.

translation.en: Pemmie, it's quite all right to admit you have feelings for other people.
translation.it: Pemmie, ammettere che provi dei sentimenti per gli altri è ok.

translation.en: You've gone mushy since the last time I saw you.
translation.it: La scorsa volta non eri così sdolcinato.

translation.en: -'Tis the season. -[scoffs]
Speaking of mushy, may I have this dance?
translation.it: A proposito di sdolcinato, mi concedi questo ballo?

translation.en: You're determined to smother us in holiday cheese, aren't you?
translation.it: Ti piacciono proprio queste smancerie natalizie, vero?

translation.en: You catch on quick.
Promise me you'll drive safely.
I promise. I'll be back before you know it.
translation.it: Te lo prometto. Tornerò in men che non si dica.

translation.en: Pete, old boy, is climbing the roof the only way to get into Hunter's house?
translation.it: Pete, arrampicarsi sul tetto è l'unico modo per entrare a casa di Hunter?

translation.en: Yes, Reggie.
The trickiest part is getting back down.
Can't we just take the stairs?
Let's go.
[Amoah] I cannot tell you how impressed His Eminence was
translation.it: Sua Eminenza è rimasto davvero colpito

translation.en: that you and Princess Stacy have been involved
translation.it: che voi e la Principessa Stacy vi occupiate

translation.en: in all the details of this wondrous event.
translation.it: di tutti i dettagli di questo evento stupendo.

translation.en: Most people would let others do the work and take the credit themselves. [laughs]
translation.it: Molti lascerebbero fare agli altri e si prenderebbero il merito.

translation.en: Oh no, Stacy and I are…
are extremely involved.
As a matter of fact, she's in a meeting with the logistics committee right now,
translation.it: Proprio in questo momento è in riunione con la logistica,

translation.en: but if she were here, she'd tell you how deeply moved we are
translation.it: ma se fosse qui, le direbbe che è un onore

translation.en: that the Vatican chose to honor our efforts.
translation.it: che il Vaticano celebri i nostri sforzi.

translation.en: Oh, we have not always chosen wisely. Oh no, no, no.
translation.it: Non sempre abbiamo scelto le persone giuste.

translation.en: In fact, in the 16th century,
we loaned the Star of Peace to Harry the Horrible,
translation.it: prestammo la Stella della Pace a Harry L'Orribile,

translation.en: the ruler of Caledonia.
It was a great mistake.
A band of thieves nearly made away with it.
translation.it: Una banda di ladri non la rubò per un soffio.

translation.en: They were tarred and feathered,
translation.it: Vennero cosparsi di pece e piume,

translation.en: but Harry was blamed because it happened on his watch.
translation.it: ma la colpa ricadde su Harry, poiché era sua responsabilità.

translation.en: -[exhales] -The poor devil was excommunicated.
translation.it: ma la colpa ricadde su Harry, poiché era sua responsabilità. Lo scomunicarono, povero diavolo.

translation.en: Are you all right, my dear?
Just overcome with emotion.
I understand completely.
The moment you light up that tree
not only will the eyes of the world be upon you but also the eyes of God.
translation.it: gli occhi di tutto il mondo e quelli di Dio saranno puntati su di voi.

translation.en: Oh. [chuckles]
I never thought of it like that.
Might I offer you a slice of yule log, Cardinal?
translation.it: Posso offrirle una fetta di tronchetto, Cardinale?

translation.en: -I shouldn't. -[exhales]
-But it is Christmas. [chuckles] -Please help yourself.
translation.it: Non dovrei, ma è Natale. Prego, si serva pure.

translation.en: What in heaven's name was that?
That was the yodeler rehearsing for the ceremony.
translation.it: Era la cantante di jodel che faceva le prove per la cerimonia.

translation.en: The poor fellow sounded a bit hoarse.
translation.it: Ha la voce un po' rauca.

translation.en: Which is why he needs to practice. [laughs]
The doctor said it's just a sprain.
There is no way you can climb up the side of a building.
translation.it: Di sicuro non potrai arrampicarti su per un palazzo.

translation.en: I could supervise from the van.
-You're not supervising me, mate. -Wh-- [moans]
We still need two people to get around security in the gallery.
translation.it: Ci mancano ancora due persone per entrare nella galleria.

translation.en: Mindy can't do it. She's handling the cameras.
translation.it: Mindy non può, è alle telecamere.

translation.en: Why not let Fifi do it? She had the moves down cold.
translation.it: Perché non lo fa Fifi? Conosce ogni mossa.

translation.en: Fiona will be with Hunter.
I'm afraid we're back to square one. We'll have to come up with something else.
translation.it: Siamo punto e a capo. Dobbiamo escogitare qualcosa.

translation.en: But there isn't time to come up with something else.
[scoffs] Pay attention, Betty Crocker. I can't be at two places at once.
translation.it: Sei una sempliciotta, l'hai capito che non posso sdoppiarmi?

translation.en: -[Frank] Wait a minute. -Darling.
[Frank] Maybe she could.
[Edward] What was that, Frank?
[Frank] Forgive me for pointing out the obvious,
but if Ms. Pembroke could successfully impersonate Her Majesty,
translation.it: ma se la signorina Pembroke si è spacciata per Sua Maestà,

translation.en: it stands to reason that Her Majesty could impersonate Ms. Pembroke.
translation.it: allora Sua Maestà può impersonare la signorina Pembroke.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Not in a million years. -[Frank squeaks]
Bite your tongue.
-It's completely out of the question. -[scoffs] Certainly, sir. I…
I was just thinking out loud. How very stupid of me.
translation.it: Pensavo solo ad alta voce, che stupido.

translation.en: That's all right, Frank. We all come up with bad ideas now and again.
translation.it: Tranquillo, capita di avere delle pessime idee.

translation.en: -Indeed. -It is an outrageous idea.
But I did switch places with Stacy twice, and no one was the wiser.
translation.it: Ma io e Stacy ci siamo scambiate due volte e nessuno se n'è accorto.

translation.en: [chuckling] Trading places with Ms. Pembroke?
That's a different matter entirely.

Well, not to be unkind, Moo,

[scoffs] I do not sound like that.
[mimics Fiona] Hello, royal six-pack.
[laughs] Oh. Well, you sound exactly like that.
-I do not. -You do.
-But I don't. -But you do. -But I don't. -You really do.
Oh, she's good.
Look, I have to object. It's… it's far too risky.
If it means recovering the Star…

translation.en: Indeed.
Well, here we go again.
No, arch your back.
More.

[Fiona] Ready?
[Margaret] Oh dear.
And one, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.
One, two, three. You're starting to get the hang of it.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
[Fiona] Now, swing those hips.
[Margaret] I feel like I am.

translation.it: ma non sa resistere a un buon Martini.

And he's excellent at the tango.
I might need to brush up. [chuckles]
Not to presume, Mr. Maxwell,
but if you are in need of a wheelman, I am more than happy to volunteer.

translation.en: Now, that's not something you see every day.

translation.en: Hang on. The frame is wrong.

translation.en: May I?
It's like this.
If I could please have everyone's attention.
May I present Fiona Pembroke.
And Fiona Pembroke.
[exhales] Any thoughts?
[hesitates] It's amazing.
And a bit unsettling.
I know exactly how you feel.
-I'll do the hair once you're in the gown. -I'll go change.

translation.en: -I think this might work. [laughs] -[Margaret] Mm.
-All right then. Let's get the van ready. -Right.
translation.it: - Va bene. Prepariamo il furgone. - Giusto.

translation.en: I was thinking maybe, when this is over,
translation.it: Pensavo che, quando sarà tutto finito,

translation.en: the two of us could spend some time together.
translation.it: potremmo passare un po' di tempo insieme.

translation.en: Oh, Peter, you know I never plan past lunch.
translation.it: Peter, lo sai che non pianifico più in là del pranzo.

translation.en: Wow. Should have seen that coming.
Seen what coming?
Has it ever occurred to you that every time you start to feel something for someone, you pull away?
translation.it: Ti sei mai accorta che ogni volta che provi qualcosa per qualcuno, scappi?

translation.en: From me, from your family, from everyone. This isn't the first time it's happened.
translation.it: Da me, dalla tua famiglia, da tutti. Non è la prima volta che lo fai.

translation.en: Oh, please.
Admit it, Pemmie. You didn't leave because you had feelings for Hunter.
translation.it: - Ma dai! - Ammettilo, Pemmie. Non mi hai lasciato per Hunter,

translation.en: You left because you had feelings for me, and it scared you.
translation.it: ma provavi qualcosa per me e ti sei spaventata.

translation.en: Is that what you really think?
What I really think is that you're so hurt by what happened to you when we were kids,
translation.it: Penso che, per via del trauma di ciò che ti è successo da piccola,

translation.en: you're terrified of letting anyone in.
translation.it: hai paura di aprirti con gli altri.

translation.en: You've always got a plane to catch or somewhere to be, just like your mum.
translation.it: Hai sempre un volo da prendere o un impegno, proprio come tua madre.

translation.en: I'm nothing like her.
-I'm sorry, Fiona. I didn't mean-- -No, you meant every word.
translation.it: - Scusa, Fiona. Non intendevo… - Sì che lo intendevi.

translation.en: Let's just stick to business from now on, shall we?
translation.it: Pensiamo agli affari e basta, ok?

translation.en: Fine.
Business it is.
Van's ready.
[Peter] Brilliant.
It'll take us a while to get to Hunter's estate in this weather. I'll be back at four.

Be ready to go.
Pete, I can show you how it's done. It's a button and a twisty-twisty.

translation.en: Come on. Permission to synchronize. That's what it is.
Hey, wait up, Pete. Pete!
I call shotgun.
-You can't call shotgun. -[chuckles] Why not?
translation.it: - Non puoi sederti davanti. - Perché no?

translation.en: Could it be because we don't want a cat burglar sitting in the front seat?
translation.it: Forse perché è meglio non far sedere davanti uno scassinatore?

translation.en: I'll get in the back.
I'm fine. I'm fine.
[Margaret] Wish me luck. [Stacy] Good luck.
Just keep Hunter entertained, and everything will be fine.
translation.it: Distrai Hunter e andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: [Margaret] Fingers crossed.
I hope Margaret can carry this off.
translation.it: Spero che Margaret ce la faccia.

translation.en: Well, she pulled off being me. Remember?
translation.it: È riuscita a imitare me, ricordi?

translation.en: That was different. Hunter Cunard's a criminal.
translation.it: Era diverso. Hunter Cunard è un criminale.

translation.en: -If something goes wrong-- -Margaret can take care of herself.
translation.it: - Se qualcosa va storto… - Se la caverà.

translation.en: I'm so sorry to interrupt, but, uh, I have an urgent call

translation.en: from Mother Superior at St. Michael's.
translation.it: c'è una chiamata urgente dalla Madre Superiora del St. Michael.

translation.en: and that perhaps you could be of service.
Oh, okay.
Good evening, Mother Superior.
I deeply apologize for imposing, Your Highness,

and I… I desperately need Queen Margaret's help.
translation.it: e ho bisogno dell'aiuto della Regina Margherita.

translation.en: Uh, well, I'm happy to give her the message.
[Mother Superior hesitates] It's a rather delicate matter.
You see, the disciplinary committee
was set to review Ms. Pembroke's case after Christmas,
translation.it: doveva riesaminare il caso della sig.na Pembroke dopo Natale,

translation.en: but, uh, well, I've just received a call, and they've pushed up her review.
translation.it: ma mi hanno chiamata e hanno anticipato l'udienza.

translation.en: The committee will be here at seven o'clock.
-[gasps] Tonight? -[Mother Superior] Tonight.
Now, I really must insist Ms. Pembroke return on the double.
translation.it: La signorina Pembroke deve tornare qui all'istante.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, um, I don't know about that.
[Mother Superior] Please!
Your Highness, if it's discovered Ms. Pembroke isn't here,
translation.it: Vostra Altezza, se si scopre che la sig.na Pembroke non è qui,

translation.en: then heads will roll, including mine.
translation.it: cadranno delle teste, compresa la mia.

translation.en: The committee, well, they may recommend a jail sentence.
And not just for her.
Okay, okay. I'll… I'll see what I can do. Bye.

translation.en: -[Stacey sighs] -What's wrong?
We have to get Fiona back to St. Michael's by seven,

translation.en: or she and Mother Superior are headed to the big house.
translation.it: o finirà dietro le sbarre con la Madre Superiora.

translation.en: Stacy, Fiona's on her way to Cunard's party.

translation.en: She can't be at the convent as well.
translation.it: Non può andare anche al convento.

translation.en: Well, maybe…
No, no, no, no. I know what you're thinking. And no. Absolutely not. It's out of the question.
translation.it: So a cosa stai pensando e no. Assolutamente no, è fuori discussione.

translation.en: Edward, if Fiona doesn't show up, everything could go south.

translation.en: The disciplinary committee is going to start asking questions
translation.it: La commissione disciplinare si farà delle domande

translation.en: that we don't want to answer.
Believe me, I don't want to do this either,
translation.it: Credimi, non voglio farlo neanche io,

translation.en: but I don't think we have a choice.
translation.it: ma non credo che abbiamo altra scelta.

translation.en: Then I'm going with you.
We're a team. Remember?
Go, team. [laughs]
[man] Good evening, ma'am.
How on earth does she walk in these things?

translation.en: [sighs] Dear me.
[man] Sector one, sector two. You're good.

translation.en: -Why are you hunched over like that? -'Cause this is the way it's done.
translation.it: - Perché ti abbassi? - Perché si fa così.

translation.en: -How would you know? -Everyone knows how it's done.
translation.it: - Come lo sai? - Lo sanno tutti.

translation.en: Could you speak a little louder so everyone knows we're breaking in?

translation.en: -Nice going. -Shh.
-You shush! -Shh.
What do you think?
Absolutely terrifying.
Let's go.
Okay.
[man 1] There you are, miss.
[man 2] Fiona. Fiona Pembroke?
Don't you remember your old pal, Simon?

translation.en: From Aldovia?
Meow. [chuckles]
-Hm. -Ma chérie.
-I'm so glad that you could make it. -Oh, how could I resist one of these?
translation.it: Sono felice che tu sia venuta. Come avrei potuto resistere a uno di questi?

translation.en: Would you, uh, like to see my Christmas tree?

translation.en: I would love to see your tree. [chuckles]

translation.en: The Star of Peace.
Right where you said it would be. Let's go.
-[sighs] Okay. -[Reggie] Santa to Rudolph. Come in, Rudolph. Rudolph, do you read me?

translation.en: -Why not? -Because they're stupid.
-Now would you let me concentrate? -[Reggie] Ooh!
Well, there's no need to take that tone.

translation.en: What's new?
Not a bloody thing.
So, you never did tell me if you're still in touch with that Peter Maxwell.

Oh, yes. The, uh, purchase of your estate.
But, uh, I'm a firm believer in pleasure before business.

translation.en: You nasty boy.
Wait here.
Oh dear lord!
-The keypad was supposed to be here. -[sighs]
Check over there.
[Hunter] What do you mean, out of vintage champagne?
Put it back.
-I don't know what happened. -It's your job to know what happened.

translation.en: [woman] Well, I just--
God, all you do is make excuses. I want you gone. Tonight.

translation.en: But, sir, it's Christmas.
[mocking] "Sir, it's Christmas."
Get out of my sight.
-Now. -[glasses clink]
-[sighs] -That was uncomfortably close.
Oh. On the bright side,
found the keypad.
How on earth does she walk in these things?

translation.en: No idea.
-Are you okay? -[Edward] Well, more or less.
Never done anything like this before.
[exhales] Yeah, um, just try and be chill.
Right, yes. Chilling.
[Mother Superior] Okay. Come!
Ms. Pembroke. [chuckles nervously] There you are.
You're very late.
Correction, official man. I'm fashionably late.

translation.en: Take a seat.
-[Edward] Ladies and gentlemen-- -Aren't you--

translation.en: Prince Edward of Belgravia.
Ms. Pembroke kidnapped my wife,

translation.en: and I thought, if anybody should be a character witness on her behalf,
translation.it: e ho pensato che avrei potuto testimoniare

translation.en: well, it would be me.
But you just said she kidnapped your wife.

translation.en: Yes, I did.
And she did, but since then, she has reformed.

translation.en: You see, underneath all of, uh… uh, that,
Ms. Pembroke really has a good heart.

translation.en: And yes, she has made some mistakes,
but isn't our ability to forgive a measure of our own humanity?

translation.en: Especially at Christmas.
Is there anything you'd like to add?
Everything His Royal Hotness says is true.

translation.en: I've made some hideous mistakes.
In fact, if you need to extend my sentence,

translation.en: I completely understand.
Actually, I recommend it.
-[Edward] She doesn't mean that. -Oh, but I do.

translation.en: -No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I think we've heard enough.

translation.en: -Of course. -Take all the time you need.

Try my birthday. December 14th.

translation.en: You and Hunter haven't been together for more than five years.

translation.en: He's not going to remember your birthday.

translation.en: [scoffs] Trust me. I made an impression.

translation.en: Fine.
[sighs] Here he comes.
Well, that took forever.
Oh, trust me. It's worth the wait.
Merry Christmas.
Doesn't the duchess of Marlborough have this same bracelet?

translation.en: And matching earrings?
You know, I think I left those earrings upstairs.

translation.en: Shall we go and fetch them?
But they're playing a tango.
You always loved a good tango.
Then let's dance.
Are you ready to go upstairs and find those earrings?

translation.en: [pants] So hot. I need water.
We've reached a decision regarding Ms. Pembroke.

translation.en: The fact that she was late for this meeting
indicates a troubling disregard for authority.
translation.it: indica una mancanza di rispetto per le autorità.

translation.en: Added to her past transgressions,
it would appear that increasing her sentence is warranted.

translation.en: If I may be allowed to say, uh, just one more point about my wi… Ms. Pembroke--

translation.en: If you'll allow me to finish please, Your Highness, sir,
I said it was warranted,
but I don't believe it's the right thing to do.
translation.it: ma non è la cosa giusta da fare.

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke,
the committee is very impressed with your sincere remorse.
translation.it: la commissione è rimasta colpita dalla sincerità del suo rimorso.

translation.en: You truly aren't the person we met with before.
translation.it: Non è la stessa persona che avevamo conosciuto.

translation.en: I truly am not.
Based on the testimony of your character witness
as well as the recommendations of Mother Superior,
translation.it: e delle raccomandazioni della Madre Superiora,

translation.en: we hereby commute the remainder of your sentence.
translation.it: commutiamo il resto della sua pena.

translation.en: It's a Christmas miracle!
[hesitates] Of course we will miss you terribly.
Oh, of course you will.
Well, we best be going.
-[chuckles] -Yes.
Thank you very much, and of course, Merry Christmas.

translation.en: I'm not sure how I feel about getting Fiona off the hook.
translation.it: Non so come mi sento ad aver aiutato Fiona.

translation.en: -Let's not worry about that right now. -[scoffs]
You know, it's deliciously exhilarating engaging in all this skulduggery.
translation.it: Sai, è stato alquanto esilarante escogitare codeste furfanterie.

translation.en: -[laughs] Come on. -Ah.
That wasn't supposed to happen.
Hey. What's that?
It's a sensor in the gallery.
Something's happening. I think it's an alarm.

translation.en: -Well, sort it out then! -I don't know what to do!
translation.it: - Fa' qualcosa! - Ma non so cosa!

translation.en: -Use the laptop! Turn it off and on again. -I don't think that's gonna work!
translation.it: - Spegni e riaccendi il computer. - Non credo che funzionerà!

translation.en: [Reggie] Google it!
Take this.
Hold on. It stopped.
For now, but the jig is up. You got to get out of there.
translation.it: Per ora, ma ci hanno scoperti. Dovete andare.

translation.en: -Maybe the music's vibration set it off. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Forse sono le vibrazioni della musica. - Sì.

translation.en: Psst! Frank! Mayday, Frank. Mayday! Abort the mission.
-What? -Get in the van!
What about Fiona and Peter?
Me and Frankie boy, we're getting out while the getting's good.
translation.it: Io e Frank ce ne andiamo finché c'è tempo.

translation.en: I ain't ending up six foot under.
Okay, I'm coming.
Oh God.
Hey, hey, hey!
Let's go.
Stay here.
Oh. But… but… I've… I've cooled off now.
translation.it: Ma aspetta. Ora mi sono rinfrescata.

translation.en: -I'll only be a minute. -[exhales]
-I'll be back as fast as I can. -[gasps]
[exhales] Don't panic. Keep calm and carry on.
translation.it: Niente panico. Mantieni la calma e vai avanti.

translation.en: [exhales] And run.
-[man 1] Check on that room! -They're coming. Take it.
What about you?
Just take it. Go. I'll distract them.
translation.it: Prendila e basta. Vai. Io li distraggo.

translation.en: [man 2] Hey! Over here!
[man 3 on comm] He's heading to the east stairway.
translation.it: Si dirige verso la scalinata est.

translation.en: Alpha team to the east exit.
[inhales] Almost there.
[man 4] Your cape, Your Majesty.
[chuckles] Thank you.
All right! Let's get the hell out of here!
Move it, Frank!
But Ms. Pembroke is not here!
translation.it: Ma la sig.na Pembroke non c'è!

translation.en: It's everyone for themselves! Come on!
-[man yells indistinctly] -[Reggie whimpers]
Oh dear.
Over here. Over… Stop! Come back here at once!
Frank!
[laughs] That feels much better.
[screams] You're all fired! Do you hear me?
No more free vacays and booze!
translation.it: Niente più vacanze e alcolici gratis!

translation.en: -Oh! What are you doing? -[Mindy groans]
Thank God.
[Frank screams] Fear not, Ms. Pembroke!
-I will save you. -[man] Don't let them get away!
translation.it: La salvo io. Non fateli scappare!

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke, come with me if you want to live.
translation.it: Sign.na Pembroke, venga con me se vuole vivere.

translation.en: [scoffs] Go!
-Right there! Right there! -Get it!
-I'll call the police. -No.
No police, idiot.
And shut off that alarm.
There you are. -We were so worried about you. -Zsst.
Explain.
Well, Mother Superior called, and your disciplinary meeting got pushed up,
translation.it: Ha chiamato la Madre Superiora, hanno anticipato la tua udienza,

translation.en: so I had to be you.
But never mind me. Are you guys okay?
Well, more or less. There was a bit of a hitch.
translation.it: Più o meno. C'è stato un piccolo intoppo.

translation.en: Peter had to stay behind to create a diversion.
translation.it: Peter è rimasto là per creare un diversivo.

translation.en: But he was able to escape?
Well, we still haven't heard from him, so we don't know.
translation.it: Non l'abbiamo ancora sentito, quindi non lo sappiamo.

translation.en: Well, did you get the Star?
Of course we did, royal worrywart.
translation.it: Certo che sì. Quanto sei apprensiva.

translation.en: [Margaret] Uh, Fiona.
What is it?
He switched it. Which means Peter has the Star.
translation.it: - Le ha scambiate. - Quindi Peter ha la Stella.

translation.en: He fooled every one of us into thinking we could trust him.
translation.it: Ci ha ingannati e gli abbiamo creduto.

translation.en: After everything we went through? I can't believe it.
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che abbiamo passato. Non ci credo.

translation.en: [Margaret] Fiona.
Fiona, you can't feel bad about this.
Yeah, it really isn't your fault.
Well, then whose fault is it?
-We're back! Merry Chri-- -We're back!
What the… Who the…
-Huh? -What's going on?
I can explain everything.
Which one are you?
It's okay, Kev. That's Margaret, not Fiona.
translation.it: Tranquillo, Kev, è Margaret, non Fiona.

translation.en: -Stacy? -Yeah.
-And that's Margaret? -Mm-hmm.
-Are you sure? -Let me prove it to you.
-No, no, no. -[Margaret] Shh.
[exhales] Okay. It's you.
-Mm. -Phew. That was really strange.
I guess we should call a press conference and let everyone know what's happened.
