translation.en: [Edward] I can see the headline now.
translation.it: Vedo già i titoli. PETER ORE 8:00 ALLA MANDERSTON

translation.en: "Saint Nicholas's Star of Peace gone forever."
translation.it: PETER ORE 8:00 ALLA MANDERSTON "Addio alla Stella della Pace."

translation.en: I suppose we should cancel everything.
The tree lighting, all of it.
translation.it: E la cerimonia di accensione dell'albero.

translation.en: Well, first, let's start by informing Inspector Moretti and the cardinal.
translation.it: Innanzitutto informiamo l'ispettore Moretti e il Cardinale.

translation.en: They deserve to be prepared before all hell breaks loose.
translation.it: Devono prepararsi al caos che verrà.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Oh, um, you should know the disciplinary committee waived the rest of your sentence.
translation.it: Devi sapere che la commissione ti ha commutato la pena.

translation.en: -What was that? -[Stacy] No more community service.
translation.it: - Come, scusa? - Niente più lavori socialmente utili.

translation.en: You're done.
[Reggie] You hear that, Fifi?
You're as free as a bird.
Even so, we're hoping you'll stay and spend the holidays with us.
translation.it: Ciononostante, vorremmo che passassi le feste con noi.

translation.en: There's a noon flight to Capri tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani a mezzogiorno c'è un volo per Capri.

translation.en: We can make it if we leave after breakfast.
[scoffs] Capri it is.
-Yes! -Joyeux Noel, mes amours.
-Hello, dear. -Hello. [chuckles]
Mummy, Mummy, Mummy!
[Mindy] Manderston Academy? What we doing here?
-[Reggie] Looks like a school to me. -[Mindy] Brilliant deduction, Sherlock.
translation.it: Sembra una scuola. Ottima deduzione, Sherlock.

translation.en: [boy] Merry Christmas!
I hated school. Skipped most of it.
translation.it: Odiavo la scuola, non ci andavo mai.

translation.en: That explains a lot.
Hey, Fifi, where you going?
-Stop talking. -[girl] Emily, I'm gonna miss you so much!
translation.it: Stai zitto. - Emily, mi mancherai tanto. - Anche tu.

translation.en: -Me too. Happy Holidays! -[girl] Bye! Have a great Christmas!
translation.it: - Emily, mi mancherai tanto. - Anche tu. - Buone feste. - Ciao. Buon Natale!

translation.en: Where's the Star, Peter?
I needed to get your attention.
[scoffs] I want the Star.
And you'll get it.
But in exchange, I need you to pop around to the dining hall.
translation.it: Ma in cambio, devi fare un salto nel refettorio.

translation.en: What on earth for?
She wants to talk to you.
How dare you tell me what to do?
Someone has to, or you'll just go on living an empty, hollow life.
translation.it: Qualcuno deve pur farlo o la tua vita continuerà a essere vuota.

translation.en: [scoffs] So that's why you double-crossed me, to let me know I'm destined to be lonely and miserable?
translation.it: Per questo mi hai tradita, per dirmi che sarò sempre sola e triste?

translation.en: More or less.
Do you want to give me what I came here for?
translation.it: Mi dai quello per cui sono venuta?

translation.en: Or shall I call the police and have you arrested?
translation.it: O devo chiamare la polizia e farti arrestare?

translation.en: I know I said I'd always be there for you, Pemmie,
translation.it: Avevo detto che ci sarei sempre stato per te,

translation.en: but this is the end of the line for us.
That's a relief.
Hello, Mummy.
I didn't think you'd come.
I wasn't going to,
but Peter said you wanted to speak to me, so go ahead.
translation.it: ma Peter ha detto che volevi parlarmi, quindi eccomi qui.

translation.en: Speak.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it?
translation.it: Tale madre, tale figlia, o sbaglio?

translation.en: Is that what you've waited all these years to tell me?
translation.it: Hai aspettato tutti questi anni per dirmi questo?

translation.en: Fiona darling, we can't go on like this.
translation.it: Fiona, tesoro, non possiamo continuare così.

translation.en: Oh, I don't see why not.
You know, I've spent the last few years traveling the world
translation.it: Ho passato gli ultimi anni in giro per il mondo

translation.en: trying to find some inner peace.
translation.it: alla ricerca di un po' di pace interiore.

translation.en: Eat, Pray, Love. It's so last decade.
translation.it: Mangia, prega, ama. Sei in ritardo di un decennio.

translation.en: [Bianca] That may be.
But it was on a retreat at an ashram in Rishikesh
translation.it: Ma, durante un ritiro in un Ashram di Rishikesh,

translation.en: that I finally realized that there has been a void in my life.
translation.it: ho capito che nella mia vita c'era un vuoto.

translation.en: Something missing.
And it's my daughter.
Fiona. Fiona…
I love you more than anything or anyone.
translation.it: ti voglio bene come a nessun altro.

translation.en: I always have.
Do you have any idea what it was like
translation.it: Hai idea di come sia stato

translation.en: trying to be good enough to be noticed by you?
translation.it: cercare di essere sempre abbastanza per farmi notare da te?

translation.en: Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
Better than you think. Oh no, that is a lie.
translation.it: - Più di quanto pensi. - No, tutte balle.

translation.en: You always had somewhere else you had to be.
translation.it: Dovevi sempre essere da qualche altra parte.

translation.en: You always had a plane to catch.
translation.it: Avevi sempre un volo da prendere.

translation.en: I was running away.
-[scoffs] -No, not from you.
Never from you.
Your father was…
Your father was cruel to me,
translation.it: Tuo padre era un uomo crudele

translation.en: and rather than suffer it,
I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.it: ho fatto di tutto per allontanarmici il più possibile.

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
translation.it: Quindi sei qui per trovare delle scuse.

translation.en: No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
translation.it: Ciò che ho fatto è imperdonabile.

translation.en: You're damned right there isn't.
I've carried this around for years.
Do you remember?
You gave it to me when you were ten. [chuckles]
translation.it: Me l'hai dato quando avevi dieci anni.

translation.en: When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.it: Quando ero qui, rubavo tante piccole cosette in giro

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas,
translation.it: e le incartavo, così a Natale

translation.en: I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.it: potevo aprirle e fingere che fossero regali da parte tua.

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
translation.it: Ti volevo un sacco di bene e ci ho provato.

translation.en: I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.it: Ci ho provato a ignorare il fatto che non fossi degna del tuo affetto.

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
translation.it: Fiona. - No. - La mia meravigliosa bambina.

translation.en: I was a wretched mother,
and even though I don't deserve it,
translation.it: e, nonostante non me lo meriti,

translation.en: I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.it: Ti prego, tesoro, dammi una seconda possibilità.

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.it: Chissà quanti Natali ci restano, a me e te?

translation.en: It's too late.
[sobs] Fiona.
♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
Hey! Come on, Fifi!
We've got a plane to catch.
Fifi.
-What? -[Reggie] Where you going? Come back!
translation.it: - Fifi. - Cosa? Dove vai? Torna qui!

translation.en: Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
-[Reggie] What you doing? We've got to go! -Come back! We can't drive this!
translation.it: - Che fai? Dobbiamo andare! - Non sappiamo guidarla!

translation.en: [Bianca] Oh, darling.
Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay. -♪ Home is where the love is ♪ -It's okay. [chuckles]
Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
translation.it: Ehi, andrà tutto bene. Te lo prometto.

translation.en: Right this way, please.
Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
so good of you to come on such short notice.
Your message said it was urgent.
[exhales] I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
Please take a seat.
I do hope everything is all right.
-Um-- -It isn't all right. -[sighs] -It's fabulous, darling.
We gave the old thing a bit of a polish. -[sighs] -[Bianca chuckles]
translation.it: Abbiamo dato una lucidata alla vecchietta.

translation.en: I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.it: Se mi dispiace? È meravigliosa. Gratias ago Deo.

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
-Pleasure to be seen. -[chuckles]
[chuckling] And who do we have here?
Mummy, please.
So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.it: Allora, passerete il Natale con noi?

translation.en: [exhales] Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
All right?
[scoffs] We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.it: Ci farebbe un sacco piacere. Siamo una famiglia.

translation.en: I suppose we are.
[Stacy] Um, Fiona?
I know you and I don't have that much in common,
translation.it: So che non abbiamo molto in comune…

translation.en: really anything in common.
I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.it: Ma volevo dirti che ti sono davvero grata per ciò che hai fatto.

translation.en: -You could have just disappeared. -Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.it: Avresti potuto sparire. Ho smesso di sparire.

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.it: Ah, come hai fatto a convincere Peter a ridarti la Stella?

translation.en: Oh yeah.
He intended to, all along.
So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
translation.it: Quindi si unirà a noi per Natale?

translation.en: Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
translation.it: Io e Peter abbiamo preso strade diverse.

translation.en: [Stacy] Oh no.
I'm so sorry.
Don't be. It's for the best.
I think you need a hug.
Please, no.
No… There it is.
Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.it: La mia famiglia è filippina. Amiamo gli abbracci.

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
translation.it: Sul tetto di casa riposa la renna

translation.en: ♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
translation.it: E Babbo Natale smonta dalla slitta

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
translation.it: Coi giocattoli scende per il camino

translation.en: ♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
-♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -[woman yodels]
translation.it: Ho, ho, ho! Tutti insieme cantiam!

translation.en: ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
translation.it: Ho, ho, ho! Tutti insieme cantiam!

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
translation.it: Sul tetto di casa, click, click, click

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
translation.it: Con San Nicola giù per il camin

translation.en: After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che abbiamo passato, è un miracolo avercela fatta.

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
translation.it: Che n'è stato di Hunter Cunard?

translation.en: Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.it: L'hanno arrestato ieri sera mentre cercava di lasciare il Paese.

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
Well, deservedly so.
I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
Did you happen to keep those red heels?
translation.it: I tacchi rossi, li hai tenuti?

translation.en: I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.it: Sono molto orgoglioso di te e anche della Regina Margaret, ovvio,

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.it: Non ce l'avrei fatta senza di te.

translation.en: Well, I dare say we make a great team.
Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
translation.it: Come quel tipo elegante che si veste da pipistrello

translation.en: and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
translation.it: e la sua bella compagna felina.

translation.en: [laughs] Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.it: Tesoro, Batman e Catwoman non sono una squadra.

translation.en: Of course they are.
I love you.
[chuckles] Cheers, darling.
You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.it: Questo è il miglior Natale di sempre.

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.it: No, perché ho riavuto la mia bellissima figlia.

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
translation.it: D'ora in poi sarà sempre così tra noi?

translation.en: All gooey and sentimental?
Mm-hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
Merry Christmas, darling.
Merry Christmas, Mummy.
Love you.
Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
[laughing] I'm so happy!
-I'm so glad we're together. -Oh my!
-Look at this guy! -[laughs]
You! You look bangin', bro.
[Mindy] Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
[Peter] Talk about clichés.
Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.it: Una bella donna da sola a Natale che guarda il cielo.

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
translation.it: Mi aspettavo di meglio da te.

translation.en: I didn't think I'd see you again.
translation.it: Non credevo ti avrei più rivisto.

translation.en: I was mad at you, Pemmie,
because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.it: perché non tenevi a me quanto io tengo a te.

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.it: Ma non è un buon motivo per avercela con qualcuno…

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
It's my turn to apologize.
You were right.
I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.it: Taglio fuori le persone, perché mi fa sentire protetta.

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
translation.it: È come ha detto la mamma.

translation.en: We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.it: Non sappiamo quanto tempo ci resta con le persone a cui teniamo.

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.it: Promettimi che non perderemo altro tempo.

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen,
before we light our tree,
we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are that you all are here tonight.
translation.it: volevamo ringraziarvi per essere qui, ne siamo molto felici.

translation.en: And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.it: Speriamo che lo spirito natalizio di benevolenza e amore

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.it: possa illuminare il mondo come la Stella della Pace.

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.it: Senza ulteriori indugi, principessa Olivia, farai tu gli onori?

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
♪ Fa-la-la-la-la, la-la-la-la ♪
♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
♪ Fa-la-la-la-la, la-la-la-la ♪
♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
Oh my God! Phew!
